snippet: The government will sell its final holdings of the American International Group, the insurance giant it bailed out in 2008 - and at a profit.
abstract: The government will sell its final holdings of the American International Group, the insurance giant it bailed out in 2008 - and at a profit.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bailout Over, U.S. Treasury Plans to Sell A.I.G. Shares
headline.print_headline: Bailout Over, U.S. Treasury Plans to Sell A.I.G. Shares
